casebody.data:
NEW HAVEN PARKING AUTHORITY, et al.
v.
LONG WHARF REALTY CORPORATION, et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 21, 2017

Scott M. Schwartz, in support of the petition.

Clifford, A. Merin and Joseph L. Rini, in opposition.

The petition by the defendants Rommerro Farrah, Albert Farrah and East Shore Management, LLC, for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 39948) is denied.
